channel.title: How i make me admin in my own server?
channel.description: i donwloaded tetscape and my server is running O.K. but im just a normal player so i can't have mod commands, etc. so any help?

item.title: How i make me admin in my own server?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Since you’re using Testscape, search for

Admin List

You should see

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“nvi ible”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“albel nox”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“base”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwnzor69”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“smitty”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“stoned4life1”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lemonslayer”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“inuyasha”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bdawgx”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“k k kwarlord”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“juggalo269”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code]
Just change the name in quotes to the name of the character that you want mod/admin.
1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = staff

Read full topic
